 II. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָלַט‎</span>] **verb** ==be stunted== (? = I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ק‎</span>; properly ***be drawn in*** ? compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***very short***); — 

**Qal** ***Passive participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׂרוּעַ וְקָלוּט‎</span> [[Lev.22.23|Lev 22:23]] sacrifice animal, overgrown or ***stunted***.
